00032 #ifndef HARDWARE_INTERFACE_JOINT_STATE_INTERFACE_H
00033 #define HARDWARE_INTERFACE_JOINT_STATE_INTERFACE_H
00034 
00035 #include <hardware_interface/hardware_interface.h>
00036 #include <string>
00037 #include <map>
00038 #include <vector>
00039 #include <utility>  // for std::make_pair
00040 
00041 namespace hardware_interface{
00042 
00044 class JointStateHandle
00045 {
00046 public:
00047   JointStateHandle() {};
00048   JointStateHandle(const std::string& name, const double* pos, const double* vel, const double* eff)
00049     : name_(name), pos_(pos), vel_(vel), eff_(eff)
00050   {}
00051 
00052   std::string getName() const {return name_;}
00053   double getPosition() const {return *pos_;}
00054   double getVelocity() const {return *vel_;}
00055   double getEffort()   const {return *eff_;}
00056 
00057 private:
00058   std::string name_;
00059   const double* pos_;
00060   const double* vel_;
00061   const double* eff_;
00062 };
00063 
00064 
00072 class JointStateInterface: public HardwareInterface
00073 {
00074 public:
00076   std::vector<std::string> getJointNames() const
00077   {
00078     std::vector<std::string> out;
00079     out.reserve(handle_map_.size());
00080     for( HandleMap::const_iterator it = handle_map_.begin(); it != handle_map_.end(); ++it)
00081     {
00082       out.push_back(it->first);
00083     }
00084     return out;
00085   }
00086 
00095   void registerJoint(const std::string& name, double* pos, double* vel, double* eff)
00096   {
00097     JointStateHandle handle(name, pos, vel, eff);
00098     HandleMap::iterator it = handle_map_.find(name);
00099     if (it == handle_map_.end())
00100       handle_map_.insert(std::make_pair(name, handle));
00101     else
00102       it->second = handle;
00103   }
00104 
00110   JointStateHandle getJointStateHandle(const std::string& name) const
00111   {
00112     HandleMap::const_iterator it = handle_map_.find(name);
00113 
00114     if (it == handle_map_.end())
00115       throw HardwareInterfaceException("Could not find joint [" + name + "] in JointStateInterface");
00116 
00117     return it->second;
00118   }
00119 
00120 private:
00121   typedef std::map<std::string, JointStateHandle> HandleMap;
00122   HandleMap handle_map_;
00123 
00124 };
00125 
00126 }
00127 
00128 #endif
